data.title: Govt seeks answer on ship attack
data.description: The government has lodged a formal protest with the Myanmar government, after a fleet of Thai fishing boats were attacked off the waters of Ranong on Saturday.

data.title: Chamber of Commerce urges Thai firms to step up exports to China
data.description: Thai exporters must be prepared for fiercer competition in Chinese markets

data.title: Greater Bangkok to face thick smog from Monday to Friday
data.description: The Pollution Control Department is warning that people in Greater Bangkok will face thick smog from Monday to Friday due to smoke from farmland and stagnant air over the capital and nearby provinces.

data.title: PRD to communicate with southern flood victims
data.description: Joint Information Centre to coordinate efforts to help flood victims in southern border provinces

data.title: Paetongtarn denies ignoring southern flood victims
data.description: PM says she assigned some Cabinet members to take immediate action to help victims

data.title: Explore December 2024 with Thailand’s top events
data.description: TAT invites people to plan December travels with must-see events across the country

data.title: Chinese man arrested at Bangkok airport over luxury used car fraud
data.description: Police captured a Chinese citizen who allegedly committed crimes related to luxury used cars at Suvarnabhumi Airport on Sunday as he was about to board a flight to Cambodia.

data.title: Nation TV finds flood relief efforts wanting in South
data.description: Criticisms circulating on social media largely reflect truth, volunteers report

data.title: Nation Group and partners expand flood relief in Southern region
data.description: Project establishes relief kitchen, distributes food and survival kits to flood-affected residents

data.title: Body of missing Russian tourist found on Samui beach
data.description: SURAT THANI - A drowned Russian tourist has been found dead on Chaweng Beach on Koh Samui after she was swept into the sea on Friday.

data.title: Phumtham demands return of 4 Thai crew members from Myanmar
data.description: The four Thais were among 31 crew members of a fishing boat captured by a Myanmar warship early on Saturday

data.title: Japanese electronic component maker to invest 62bn more in Thailand
data.description: Murata Electronics to build new factory in Lamphun province

data.title: China vows 'resolute countermeasures' after US arms sale to Taiwan
data.description: China vowed "resolute countermeasures" on Sunday to a recently approved US arms sale to Taiwan, saying it had lodged a complaint over the sale, which it said seriously infringes on China

data.title: Queen presides over final of World Para Ice Hockey Championship
data.description: Finland beat Thailand 1-0 after close battle to win the title

data.title: Thailand seeks release of fishing crew, protests Myanmar attack on boats
data.description: Authorities are negotiating for the release of four Thai crew members arrested with a fishing boat towed to Myanmar and protesting against a gun attack on 15 fishing boats early Friday morning.

data.title: Majority of voters disagree with party dissolution penalty: NIDA Poll
data.description: Nearly 40% say only party execs found guilty of wrongdoing should face political ban

data.title: PM’s popularity above 50% but government’s rating falls in November
data.description: Survey shows score was lower on several indices than in October

data.title: Special lane opens at Rama II Road collapse site outside Bangkok
data.description: SAMUT SAKHON: The Highways Department on Sunday opened a reversible lane to relieve outbound traffic on Rama II Road that was affected by the elevated road collapse from last Friday.

data.title: Five districts in Phatthalung still battling floods after heavy rains
data.description: Slow drainage of water into Songkhla Lake blamed for the situation

data.title: Flooding eases in Hat Yai but parts of southern Thailand still under water
data.description: Hat Yai, the economic hub in Thailand

data.title: Landslide hits southern Thailand's Betong
data.description: YALA: A landslide happened in Betong district in this southern border province on Sunday morning. No one was injured.

data.title: Energy Ministry working to tackle gas, fuel shortage in South: Pirapan
data.description: Minister attributes rerouting of transportation due to flooding for the delay

data.title: Critics question Laos dam project's impact on Thailand
data.description: Environmentalists have raised concerns about a 100-billion-baht  dam  project on the lower section of the  Mekong River  in  Laos , warning of adverse effects on the livelihoods of those living on both sides of the Thai-Lao border.

data.title: India imposes anti-dumping duty on import of ECH from Thailand
data.description: Thai exporters have appealed against the claim that the import of Epichlorohydrin was affecting local industry

data.title: Cool to cold weather to persist in most parts of Thailand
data.description: Southern monsoon weakening, but lower South to receive heavy rains

data.title: UNAIDS report: Upholding human rights is key to ending the AIDS pandemic
data.description: Asia Pacific seeks to lower HIV-related stigma and rights violations through education about U=U

data.title: Israel warns citizens of terror threat in Southeast Asia with focus on Thailand
data.description: Israel warned its citizens that the threat of terrorism against them in Southeast Asia has intensified.

data.title: Online scams related to charity and aid activities ‘a serious problem’
data.description: NESDC report flags social issue that exploits people’s compassion
